string.name: name
string.value: Amoria : The Sakura Garden 2 - Finishing Touches
Jacob mentioned he'd need more help. Perhaps I should pay him a visit?

I went to see Jacob again, and his Sakura Garden is just about done. He wants to do something special for the first guests, so I've agreed to provide #b20 White/Purple Gift Boxes#k, #b10 Lupin Dolls#k and #b10 Toy Baby Seals#k. Shouldn't be too tough, and he's mentioned something special if I finish...
I finished getting everything for Jacob and returned to him for my reward-#bBlossom Juice#k! It tastes great!
...Ah, I must thank you for your assistance with the Cherry Blossoms, which are growing nicely-and the sofas, which look magnificent. I do have one other task for you if you're up to it.

Excellent, excellent! Well, to celebrate the opening of the new Sakura Garden, I've decided to give away some presents. As you demonstrated such combat prowess last time, I'm sure acquiring #b20 White/Purple-ribbon gift boxes#k, #b10 Lupin Dolls#k and #b10 Toy Baby Seals#k should be a simple twist of the sword for you! You might want to try Pink Teddies for the gift boxes, the Lupin Dolls and Toy Baby Seals should be easier to find. I have something special for you this time around.
That's unfortunate... you were a fantastic worker. Well, should you reconsider, you know where to find me!
A fine job, my friend! You've accomplished a task of the highest order! I want you to take this #bBlossom Juice#k as your hard-earned reward. You have my gratitude...
You're assistance has proven invaluable, my friend. Thanks again!
Hmm, your satchel appears to have a hole in it my friend, when you sew it up, gather the rest and head back here.
